summary: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.
cast: Deborah Kerr|Yul Brynner|Rita Moreno|Martin Benson|Terry Saunders|Rex Thompson|Carlos Rivas|Patrick Adiarte|Alan Mowbray|Geoffrey Toone|Leo Abbey|Robert Banas|Dennis Bonilla|Thomas Bonilla|Jerry Chien|Nancy Chien|Mary Lou Clifford|Judy Dan|Gemze De Lappe|Amir Farr|Henry Fong|Margaret Fukuda|Yvonne Garosin|Maureen Hingert|Dick Kay Hong|Linda Hong|Warren Hsieh|Daro Induye|Charles Irwin|Michiko Iseri|Dale Ishimoto|Kanna Ishu|Irene James|Marion Jim|Misaye Kawasumi|Candace Lee|Virginia Ann Lee|Warren Lee|Jeanette Leung|Fuji Levi|Weaver Levy|Joycelyne Lew|Marco Lopez|Edwin Luke|Stella Lynn|Nephru Malouf|Grace Matthews|Maria McClay|Nobuko Miyamoto|Shirley Nishimura|Marni Nixon|Valentina Oumanski|Stephanie Pond-Smith|Evelyn Rudie|Kathleen Shoon|Josephine Smith|Alladin Soufi|Leonard Strong|Don Keigo Takeuchi|Alice Uchida|Russell Ung|Lydia Wolf|Jadin Wong|Jean Wong|Dusty Worrall|Rodney Yee|William Yip|Yuriko
title: El rey y yo
